results.title: Metformin inhibits methylglyoxal-induced retinal pigment epithelial cell death and retinopathy via AMPK-dependent mechanisms: Reversing mitochondrial dysfunction and upregulating glyoxalase 1
results.text_hl: Although the therapeutic potential of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for @DISEASE_Hypertensive_Retinopathy @DISEASE_MESH:D058437 @@@retinopathy disorders@@@ has recently been elucidated, possibly through @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ activation, it remains unknown how @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ directly affects the @CHEMICAL_Pyruvaldehyde @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011765 @@@MGO@@@-induced stress response in @<m>DISEASE_Retinitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012173 @@@retinal pigment@@@ epithelial cells.

results.title: Intravitreal Metformin Protects Against Choroidal Neovascularization and Light-Induced Retinal Degeneration.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, IVT @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ protected against @<m>DISEASE_Retinitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012173 @@@retinal thinning@@@ in response to light-induced degeneration.

results.title: AMPK May Play an Important Role in the Retinal Metabolic Ecosystem.
results.text_hl: We investigated whether activation of 5' adenosine monophosphate protein kinase (AMPK) is protective to the retina in several preclinical @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ models of @DISEASE_Retinal_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D012162 @@@retinal degeneration@@@ and found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-induced activation of AMPK was able to delay or prevent @DISEASE_Retinal_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D012162 @@@retinal degeneration@@@ in the @CELLLINE_CVCL:0028 @@@rd10@@@ model of @DISEASE_Retinitis_Pigmentosa @DISEASE_MESH:D012174 @@@retinitis pigmentosa@@@, the @CHEMICAL_sodium_iodate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C032285 @@@NaIO3@@@ model of @CELLLINE_CVCL:4388 @@@RPE@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Retinitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012173 @@@retinal injury@@@, and the @DISEASE_Photophobia @DISEASE_MESH:D020795 @@@light damage@@@ model of @DISEASE_Retinal_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D012162 @@@retinal degeneration@@@.

citations.NLM: Brown EE, Lewin AS, Ash JD. AMPK May Play an Important Role in the Retinal Metabolic Ecosystem. Adv Exp Med Biol. 2019;1185():477-481. PMID: 31884657
